title: Trundle toolkit missing information (debatable)
body:
So a while back Phreak claimed that Trundle's ult also stole damage reduction, however this information is not on his toolkit, the official trundle page on leagueoflegends.com, or on his wiki page. Is this statement true? If so please indicate this on his toolkit. Thank you.
P.S. I am posting this in "report a bug" because if this is true it should be in his toolkit, and it is not.

replies.body: Trundle doesn't steal damage reduction. We did however try that as a possible change in internal playtests, which I'm guessing is what Phreak was thinking of.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u2ejzuq3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-14T01:02:38.179+0000)
>
> Trundle doesn't steal damage reduction. We did however try that as a possible change in internal playtests, which I'm guessing is what Phreak was thinking of.

So is this likely to be a Trundle buff soon (TM) or did the change get put down?
Speaking of missing information, could you maybe list how much his Q slows? I know it's brief and all, but would still be nice to have a number.

That myth floated around for a while and spread a bit thanks to that post. I'd actually started telling people outside of the boards that this was the case. I wish you guys had shut it down before it got to this point.
